protein.specific_function: Might act as an inhibitor of spontaneous calcium carbonate precipitation. May be associated with neuronal sprouting in brain, and with brain and pancreas regeneration

reference.reference_text: Bartoli C, Gharib B, Giorgi D, Sansonetti A, Dagorn JC, Berge-Lefranc JL: A gene homologous to the reg gene is expressed in the human pancreas. FEBS Lett. 1993 Aug 2;327(3):289-93.
